overview: This time, we asked Hello! Project members a quiz based on the results of a questionnaire taken in advance with the title "I asked the quiz halomen." Pay attention not only to the respondent members who appear, but also to the reaction of the cheering seats! Please enjoy the lively recording studio together with the next work "Vol.76"! The moderator is Joujou Gundan! The appearance as a respondent this time (Vol.75) is Morning Musume.'22, ANGERME, and OCHA NORMA. Disc 1 (107mins), Disc 2 (104mins).
title: Hello! Project DVD Magazine Vol.75
